title: Typical monopoly sets price higher than MC

content.question: Which of the following is necessarily true of the profit-maximizing equilibrium of a monopolist who sets a single price?

choices.label: Price is greater than marginal cost.
Average total cost is at its minimum level.
Marginal revenue is greater than marginal cost.

content.answer: Price is greater than marginal cost.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
